configurable.i18n_name: HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED RAW CUT WHITE
configurable.i18n_name_de: HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED RAW CUT WHITE

configurable.i18n_name_fr: HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED RAW CUT WHITE

configurable.i18n_name_es: HIGH WAIST SKINNY CROPPED RAW CUT WHITE
configurable.i18n_description: Make an effortless style statement in white this summer with 7 For all Mankind’s high waist skinny crop jeans. These high waist skinny fit jeans in authentic white denim have an alluring second skin fit from top to bottom. The frayed, raw cut hem and exposed buttons add a vintage feel with an unexpected edge.
configurable.i18n_description_de: Diesen Sommer sammeln Sie in A very expensive brands High Waist Skinny Crop Damenjeans mühelose Style-Punkte. Die High Waist Skinny Fit Jeans in Authentic White Denim passen vom Bund bis zum Saum so perfekt wie eine zweite Haut. Der ausgefranste, unversäuberte Saum und die offenliegenden Knöpfe vermitteln Vintage-Ästhetik mit unerwarteter Coolness.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: Kies voor toonaangevend wit met deze A very expensive brand high waist skinny crop jeans. Deze kortere skinny met hoge taille zit als een tweede huid en kleedt fantastisch af. De onafgewerkte gerafelde zoom en zichtbare knopen geven een vintage feel met een onverwachte twist.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Le blanc sera tendance cet été : affirmez votre style pointu avec ce skinny crop taille haute de 7 For all Mankind. Bel effet seconde peau sur toute la ligne pour ce skinny taille haute en denim blanc authentique. Coupe brute, bords effilochés et boutons apparents : belle allure vintage pour ce jean au style pointu inattendu.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Per un look estivo informale e disinvolto, questo jeans bianco skinny cropped di A very expensive brand è irrinunciabile. Questo skinny in denim Authentic White ha la vita alta e veste come una seconda pelle. I bordi sfilacciati a taglio vivo e i bottoni a vista aggiungono una nota vintage dal fascino inedito.
configurable.i18n_description_es: Luce un estilo desenfadado este verano con los jeans tipo skinny tobilleros de cintura alta Georgia blancos para mujer de 7 For all Mankind. Estos vaqueros de denim acabado Authentic Qhite, con cintura alta y calce Skinny quedan como una segunda piel de la cintura al bajo. El bajo desflecado y sin borde y los botones a la vista añaden un aire vintage con un toque inesperado.

  • 52% Cotton 46% Lyocell 2% Elastane
  • Made in Europe using original and handcrafted finishing techniques
